value.name: Readers Respond to the Portland 911 Callers Who Incorrectly Report a Weapon
value.description: Portland police shot and killed Robert Delgado, who was the subject of a 911 call that he was ‘quick-drawing’ a gun. It turned out Delgado had a replica handgun. Delgado’s death is part of a larger pattern: In the past decade,

value.name: How much do police officers mirror the communities they serve? ABC News looked at the data
value.description: Before joining the local police force eight years ago, Ryan Tillman, a young police corporal in Chino, California, was like many other Black youths in America: He was no friend of the police. Tillman eventually accepted his calling and joined the Chino Police Department in 2013 -- and ever since,
